mapper.select: select page_id as entity_id, page_title as `name` from page where page_title = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
select task_id, entity_id, page_title from task_entity left join page on task_entity.entity_id = page.page_id where task_entity.task_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(*) from page left join (select min(task_id) as task_id, entity_id from task_entity group by entity_id) as entity ON page.page_id = entity.entity_id where true
and page_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and page_id in (select cl_from as pid from first_class LEFT JOIN categorylinks on first_class.`name` = categorylinks.cl_to where id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select count(*) from page left join (select min(task_id) as task_id, entity_id from task_entity group by entity_id) as entity ON page.page_id = entity.entity_id where true
and page_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
and page_id in (select cl_from as pid from second_class LEFT JOIN categorylinks on second_class.`name` = categorylinks.cl_to where id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
